title: 107_hr2572
content: Gambling ATM and CreditDebit Card Reform Act - Amends the Electronic Fund Transfer Act and the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit the placement of an electronic terminal for initiating a consumer credit transaction or the acceptance of a credit card to initiate such a transaction in the immediate area of a gambling establishment where any form of gambling is going on. Makes violators of this prohibition liable to consumers for actual and punitive damages.
